page.title: 07INTERVIEW - BROWN FARM
page.content: Social and Entertainment There are three pubs within a two mile radius but only one of these is in this Domesday area. The pub at Ralegh's cross in the area to the north also serves meals but to find a restaurant you have to go further afield, even as far as Taunton. There is sailing on Wimbleball lake to the west but not on Clatworthy. The area around Clatworthy being used now only by anglers and ramblers; riding, swimming and dogs are not permitted within the boundary for fear of pollution. There is a Young Farmers Club in Brompton Regis and scout and guide movements in Wiveliscombe. In Huish Champflower there is a cricket club, playgroup, womens institute and NFU group.
